title: David’s Kingdom Strengthens
summary: David’s rule grows stronger. He builds a palace, gains more children, and defeats the Philistines with God’s help. David inquires of God before going into battle, showing his dependence on divine guidance.

faq.question: How did David show his faith in God?
faq.answer: By asking God for direction before going to war.

faq.question: What was the result of David’s obedience?
faq.answer: God gave him victory over the Philistines.
